right on, Yanshosh!...but it wasn't me that said i would ignore damage, it
was Talon......and it was KSLawDogg who ignored damage first...i've never
ignored damage EVER before unless i just didn't recieve the mail it was
in.......KSLawDogg may have a point, but he said that he killed my
character, which is against the rules.......that is what i wanted to
say.....

is
